item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/about-the-recipes/#comment-29">seck</a>.
Yes, you can take a look at the "My Safe Foods". This includes all of the ingredients that I am currently able to cook with, including condiments. /my-safe-foods/ Condiments can be quite challenging with food allergies due to the typical use of egg, dairy, soy, fish, and wheat. However, coconut aminos is a great substitute for soy sauce and I use apple cider vinegar. Hope this helps!
